1: -module(hty_json_spaf_SUITE).
    2: -export([
    3:     all/0, groups/0,
    4:     empty_element/1, empty_attribute/1, element_with_text/1,
    5:     empty_element_with_attributes/1, 
    6:     element_with_text_and_attributes/1,
    7:     element_with_elements_with_different_names/1, 
    8:     element_with_elements_with_identical_names/1,
    9:     element_with_elements_and_text/1]).
   10: 
   11: all() -> [
   12:   {group, format}
   13: ].
   14: 
   15: groups() -> [
   16:   {format, [
   17:     empty_element,
   18:     empty_attribute,
   19:     element_with_text,
   20:     empty_element_with_attributes,
   21:     element_with_text_and_attributes,
   22:     element_with_elements_with_different_names,
   23:     element_with_elements_with_identical_names,
   24:     element_with_elements_and_text%,
   25:     %element_with_attributes_subelements_and_text
   26:   ]}
   27: ].
   28: 
   29: 
   30: % <e/>
   31: empty_element(_Cfg) ->
   32:     do_test([{push,<<"e">>},{pop,<<"e">>}], <<"{\"e\":[]}">>).
   33: 
   34: empty_attribute(_Cfg) ->
   35:     do_test([{push,<<"@e">>},{pop,<<"@e">>}], <<"{\"@e\":null}">>).
   36: 
   37: % <e>t</e>
   38: element_with_text(_Cfg) ->
   39:     do_test(
   40:         [{push,<<"e">>},{text,<<"t">>},{pop,<<"e">>}],
   41:         <<"{\"e\":[\"t\"]}">>
   42:     ).
   43: 
   44: % <e name="value" />
   45: empty_element_with_attributes(_Cfg) ->
   46:     do_test(
   47:         [{push,<<"e">>},{push,<<"@name">>},{text,<<"value">>},{pop,<<"@name">>},{pop,<<"e">>}],
   48:         <<"{\"e\":[{\"@name\":\"value\"}]}">>
   49:     ).
   50: 
   51: %  <e name="value">text</e>
   52: element_with_text_and_attributes(_Cfg) -> do_test(
   53:         [{push,<<"e">>},
   54:          {push,<<"@name">>},
   55:          {text,<<"value">>},
   56:          {pop,<<"@name">>},
   57:          {text,<<"content">>},
   58:          {pop,<<"e">>}],
   59:         <<"{\"e\":[{\"@name\":\"value\"},\"content\"]}">>
   60:     ).
   61: % 	push-e,push-a,text-text,pop-a,push-b,text-text,pop-b,pop-b <e> <a>text</a> <b>text</b> </e> 	"e": { "a": "text", "b": "text" }
   62: element_with_elements_with_different_names(_Cfg) -> do_test(
   63:         [{push,<<"e">>},
   64:          {push,<<"a">>},
   65:          {text,<<"t">>},
   66:          {pop,<<"a">>},
   67:          {push,<<"b">>},
   68:          {text,<<"t2">>},
   69:          {pop,<<"b">>},
   70:          {pop,<<"e">>}],
   71:         <<"{\"e\":[{\"a\":[\"t\"]},{\"b\":[\"t2\"]}]}">>
   72:     ).
   73: % 	<e> <a>text</a> <a>text</a> </e>
   74: element_with_elements_with_identical_names(_Cfg) -> do_test(
   75:         [{push,<<"e">>},
   76:          {push,<<"a">>},
   77:          {text,<<"t">>},
   78:          {pop,<<"a">>},
   79:          {push,<<"a">>},
   80:          {text,<<"t2">>},
   81:          {pop,<<"a">>},
   82:          {pop,<<"e">>}],
   83:         <<"{\"e\":[{\"a\":[\"t\"]},{\"a\":[\"t2\"]}]}">>
   84:     ).
   85: 
   86: % 	<e> text <a>text</a> </e>
   87: element_with_elements_and_text(_Cfg) -> do_test(
   88:         [{push,<<"e">>},
   89:          {text,<<"t">>},
   90:          {push,<<"a">>},
   91:          {text,<<"t2">>},
   92:          {pop,<<"a">>},
   93:          {pop,<<"e">>}],
   94:         <<"{\"e\":[\"t\",{\"a\":[\"t2\"]}]}">>
   95:     ).
   96: 
   97: % <project name="apa">
   98: %   <!-- needed? -->
   99: %   <dep name="annan_apa"/>
  100: %   % why?
  101: %   <dep name="tredje_apa"/>
  102: % </project>
  103: %element_with_attributes_subelements_and_text(_Cfg) -> y=n.
  104: 
  105: do_test(Evtlist, Expected) ->
  106:     {_, Actual} = lists:foldl(fun(Evt, {State, Outs}) ->
  107:         {ok, State1, Out} = hty_json_spaf:format(Evt, State),
  108:         {State1, [Out|Outs]}
  109:     end, {q0, []}, Evtlist),
  110:     Expected = list_to_binary(lists:reverse(Actual)).
